credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Robert T. Hoyt in memory of Hannah McAllister
title: Band
medium:
Medium: silk, metal foil
Technique: plain weave foundation with embroidery in running, satin and couching stitches
description: Band of red silk embroidered with orange and green floss silk and couched metal foil strips.  Bands of orange flowers on a couched (gold) metal foil background alternating with bands of (gold) metal foil couched in a twill-like pattern on a solidly embroidered background of green silk.
name: Band
